text: avane, unkalai ore manitariliruntu pataittan, avarutan kuti (inaintu) valvatarkaka avarutaiya tunaiviyai (avarilirunte) pataittan - avan avalai nerunkiya potu aval ilecana karppavatiyanal; pinpu atanaic cumantu natamatik kontiruntal; pinpu atu paluvakave, avarkaliruvarum tam'miruvarin iraivanitam, "(iraivane!) Enkalukku ni nalla (cantatiyaik) kotuttal, niccayamaka nankal iruvarum nanriyullavarkalaka iruppom" enru pirarttittuk kontiruntanar
